title: The following regulations in respect of Transit Oriented Development shall be applicable for the areas mentioned herein under
clause_text: The following regulations in respect of Transit Oriented Development shall be applicable for the areas mentioned herein under. These provisions shall come in to operation where Authorities either have or proposed RTS / Metro-rail / BRTS corridors in their Development Plans and have started implementing them.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
